text: Abdul Rehman Siddiqui (died 1953) was a politician from Bengal but living mostly in Delhi, British India. He was a staunch supporter of the All India Muslim League and in March 1940, was one of the 25 special delegates on the Working Committee of the All-India Muslim League that drafted the famous Lahore Resolution. Category:1953 deaths Category:Leaders of All India Muslim League Category:Politicians from New Delhi Category:Year of birth missing
title: Abdul Rehman Siddiqui
